title: I bought a 3a XL by expecting the E-Sim. But can't activate. And does it support dual SIM with Esim?
content: I went to carrier. They checked my phone and said they don't see the way to activate E-Sim as usual. Moreover, I'm expecting to use dual sim as one is E-Sim and another is hardware SIM card. Is it possible?
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
